title: Advancements in sustainable platinum and palladium recovery: unveiling superior adsorption efficiency and selectivity with a novel silica-anchored acylthiourea adsorbent
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7507-7516
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08169A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Malehlogonolo R. R. Mphahlele, Alseno K. Mosai, Hlanganani Tutu, Izak A. Kotzé
This study examines innovative PGM recovery using silica-anchored adsorbents. DTMSP-BT-SG shows exceptional efficiency (>98%) and selectivity for Pt and Pd, offering a cost-effective solution for extracting PGMs from mining wastewaters.
